name: North South Studios
tag_list: distance-learning, e-learning, kids-games, education, childrens-websites, electronic-toys, software, quality-assurance, nearshore-devlopement, animation
overview:
North South Studios is a full service multimedia studio staffed by a versatile team of software engineers, graphic designers, illustrators, animators, QA specialists and project managers. We specialize in furnishing a complete outsource solution for clients primarily in the education, toy, and entertainment businesses. Our clients include Leapfrog Toys, Cookie Jar Entertainment, Kaplan, K12, Knowledge Adventure, National Science Teachers Association, Smarty Ants, and more.

Founded in 2005 in Los Angeles, California, North South’s development staff is located in Lima, Peru. Our team is multi-lingual and experienced in all facets of product development. Our management has years of experience leading large teams and businesses in the US. NSS offers affordable excellence to clients worldwide.
